characterDescription:
Song is the name of affection by which Rock's wife is known. She stands up tall and raises a bow toward him when found on the Shattered Plains. He pulls her close, one arm around her shoulders.
She rubs his back, then kneels down beside him, pulling their daughter close with one arm, her husband with the other. She tells him that it was a long journey, and longest at the end, when those things came from the sky.
Knowing that Kef'ha is dead, she asks Rock what happened to him.

characterDetails.Appearance: She is a stout woman with a round face and a deep red braid. She has deep brown-green eyes in which her husband finds infinite depth.
characterDetails.History: Rock says that she is best woman in all the Horneater Peaks. That they made snow forts as children, and hers were always best. He says he should've known to find her in a castle, even if it was made of old chairs. (Someone had piled up furniture in a heap, almost like a fortification. It is out of this heap that she rises.)*
characterDetails.Notes: *A Voidbringer attack is blamed for the raid on the caravan in which Rock's family was traveling.
